page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: There are only two schools in the survey area and both of these are in the village of{Clarborough.}The Infant School is sited in the newer part of the village and the Junior School which is over 100 years old,is in the older village section. Both schools have the same headteacher and teaching staff. There is now a Village Hall under construction which should be completed around the end of 1985,but until it is ready for use the schools are needed for many village activities including:Brownies,Guides,Junior and Senior Youth Clubs,Womens' Institute, Keep Fit,Discos,Senior Citizen's Meetings,Community Association Meetings and the annual Devon Tea.
